aboutSawarna.title: Discover Sawarna Beach
aboutSawarna.p1: Located on the southern coast of Banten Province, Sawarna Beach is one of Indonesia's hidden gems. With pristine white sand, dramatic limestone cliffs, and clear waters, it is a perfect escape from city life.
aboutSawarna.p2: The area is famous for its excellent surfing conditions, natural caves, and stunning sunsets. Visitors can enjoy activities from surfing and swimming to exploring rice fields and traditional villages.
aboutSawarna.cardSubtitle: Enjoy the unspoiled and well-preserved nature of Sawarna

hero.title: About VillaSawarna
hero.subtitle: Providing the finest accommodations in Sawarna Beach for an unforgettable beach holiday experience.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: VillaSawarna was founded in 2015 by beach and nature enthusiasts inspired by the beauty of Sawarna Beach. Starting from a small private villa, we saw the potential to help travelers enjoy this beach with the best comfort.
story.p2: Over the years, we have grown from a single villa into the most complete accommodation network in the Sawarna Beach area. We work with local communities to provide authentic homestays and build private villas that offer privacy and luxury amid natural beauty.
story.p3: Our mission is simple: help travelers enjoy the beauty of Sawarna Beach with maximum comfort, while preserving nature and empowering local communities.

vision.title: Vision & Mission
vision.subtitle: Our commitment to deliver the best experience for every guest staying with VillaSawarna.
vision.visionText: To be the leading accommodation provider in Sawarna Beach known for service quality, comfort, and commitment to environmental sustainability.
vision.m1: Provide high-quality accommodations to international standards
vision.m3: Preserve the natural beauty of Sawarna Beach

why.title: Why Choose Us
why.subtitle: We are committed to delivering the best holiday experience with quality service and comfortable stays in the best locations of Sawarna Beach.
why.locText: All our stays are located in strategic areas with easy access to the beach and stunning sea views.
why.qualityText: We ensure high quality standards for all accommodations, with regular maintenance and modern facilities.
why.localExpText: Enjoy authentic experiences with local guides and culinary delights that make your holiday memorable.
why.serviceText: Our support team is ready to assist you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week to ensure comfort during your stay.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I make a reservation?
faq.a1: You can make a reservation through our website by selecting the desired property and following the steps, or by contacting our team via WhatsApp or email.
faq.q2: What is the difference between a villa and a homestay?
faq.a2: Villas offer privacy and luxury with complete facilities and dedicated staff, while homestays offer local living experiences at more affordable prices.
faq.q3: Is there a shuttle service from the station or airport?
faq.a3: Yes, we provide shuttle services from the nearest train station or airport at an additional cost. Please contact us for more details.

hero.alt: Stays in Sawarna near the beach
hero.title: Stays and Villas in Sawarna for a Comfortable Holiday
hero.subtitle: Selections of beachside villas and homestays—ideal for families, couples, and groups. Check availability & latest prices.

intro.p1: Looking for comfortable stays in Sawarna near the beach? On this page we curated the best villas and homestays around Legon Pari, Tanjung Layar, Karang Taraje, up to Ciantir Beach. Choose units that fit your needs—from budget for couples, family units with 2–3 bedrooms, to group-capacity villas with many rooms and wide parking areas.
intro.p2: For the best experience, consider distance to the beach, road access, and facilities like kitchen/BBQ and WiFi. Our team can recommend the best options based on your dates and number of guests. Use the filters below to speed up your search.

header.title: Exclusive Villas in Sawarna
header.subtitle: Find your dream villa across Sawarna. Each villa offers stunning beach views and complete facilities for an unforgettable holiday.

all.title: All Locations in Sawarna
all.desc: Discover exclusive villas across Sawarna. From Sawarna Beach to Tanjung Layar, each location offers a unique experience with stunning beach views and complete facilities for your holiday.

sawarna.title: Sawarna Beach
sawarna.desc: The main beach known for its soft white sand and surf-friendly waves. This is the tourism hub with facilities and exclusive villas offering stunning views.

goaLangir.title: Goa Langir
goaLangir.desc: A tranquil coastal area ideal for those seeking peace and pristine nature. Villas here provide a more private and exclusive stay.

karangBokor.title: Karang Bokor
karangBokor.desc: Famous for unique rock formations and breathtaking sunrise views from cliffs. Villas in this area offer easy access to enjoy the scenery from above.

legonPari.title: Legon Pari
legonPari.desc: A calm beach with white sand and clear water, ideal for swimming and snorkeling. Villas here provide a relaxed family-friendly atmosphere.

tanjungLayar.title: Tanjung Layar
tanjungLayar.desc: Home to the iconic twin rocks. Villas here offer the best sunset views in Sawarna.

puloManuk.title: Pulo Manuk
puloManuk.desc: A small island with white sandy beaches and clear waters, great for snorkeling and diving. Villas provide unique stays with ocean views.
